sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';

const secondsTable = [
    ['year', 60 * 60 * 24 * 365],
    ['month', 60 * 60 * 24 * 30],
    ['week', 60 * 60 * 24 * 7],
    ['day', 60 * 60 * 24]
]
